channel.title: Old RichScape or Silab Client?
channel.description:
Hiya everyone. I'm in need of the client for RichScape. It's a fairly old rsps. If you don't have the v4 client, but could link me to any version of the client, I'd VERY highly appreciate it.
Also, as far as I know SilabSoft has shut down.
Are there any SilabSoft clients that aren't just a .jar and actually work? I've been looking everywhere for a silabsoft source and a compatible client.
Thanks a bunch!

item.title: Old RichScape or Silab Client?
